docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description ColumnDesc Job manifest: column scope description and annotations This has three elements: 1. The column name 2. The table from which the column is or columns are drawn 3. The variable underpinning the column, which is specific to the job. JobDesc Job manifest: job specification attributes which specific job sub-classes inherit ManifestDesc Job manifest: complete specification TableDesc Job manifest: data source descriptive attributes

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description atomic_name Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting underscor... cage_id Semi-numeric cage identifier, related to station/site column Column name in table column_collected Column describes collected data column_descriptive Column describes data about the world column_modelled Column describes modelled data count_fish_collected Sampled number of fish in the farm count_fish_interpolated Interpolated number of fish in the farm depth Depth in metres description Human-readable description of the element easting 'Y'-positional data relative to point of origin fish_length Length of fish expressed (mm) fish_mass Weight of fish expressed (g) fish_species_common Common name of species sampled fish_species_scientific Scientific name of species sampled gcp_source GCP account of the generator of the manifest global_coordinate_system Global coordinate system (GCS) reference point of origin hash Checksum of some file job_scope A collection of column descriptions job_scope_collected A collection of column descriptions which are collected or sampled job_scope_descriptive A collection of column descriptions which describe something about the world job_scope_modelled A collection of column descriptions which are modelled or simulated job_type While this is analogous to Dublin Core's notion of type, it is specific to jo... jobs Specification of operations to run on resources and schemas provided latitude Latitude lice_af_average Average number of Salmon lice (adult female) per fish lice_af_total Total number of Salmon lice per fish lice_density_collected Sampled lice density (lice per m³) lice_density_modelled Modelled lice density (lice per m³) local_version Version number of local submission utility longitude Longitude national_grid_reference National grid reference (NGR) point of origin northing 'X'-positional data relative to point of origin notes Notes pertinent to observation, a set of observations, or a data-set path Path or URI provenance Provenance of an element, or a set of elements resource_hash Checksum of resource resource_path Path or URI of resource schema_path Path or URI of schema associated with resource series Data series to which a given observation belongs site_id Fish farm station/site global ID site_name Fish farm station/site local name table Table description from which column is drawn, specifically matching the `atom... tables Specification of mappings between resources and schemas, as well as columns o... title Concise human-readable name for the element type Nature or genre of the element variable Name of variable underpinning column, specific to the job

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer LatLonType Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Type: Boolean
docs.text:
A binary (true or false) value

URI: xsd:boolean

  • base: Bool

  • uri: xsd:boolean

  • repr: bool

docs.title: Class: ColumnDesc
docs.text:
Job manifest: column scope description and annotations

This has three elements:

_ 1. The column name_

_ 2. The table from which the column is or columns are drawn_

_ 3. The variable underpinning the column, which is specific to the job._

URI: saved:ColumnDesc

 classDiagram
    class ColumnDesc
      ColumnDesc : column

      ColumnDesc : table

      ColumnDesc : variable

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance column 1..1  String Column name in table direct variable 1..1  Uriorcurie Name of variable underpinning column, specific to the job direct table 1..1  Uriorcurie Table description from which column is drawn, specifically matching the `atom... direct

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used JobDesc job_scope_descriptive range ColumnDesc JobDesc job_scope_collected range ColumnDesc JobDesc job_scope_modelled range ColumnDesc

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self saved:ColumnDesc native saved:ColumnDesc

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: ColumnDesc
description: "Job manifest: column scope description and annotations\nThis has three\
  \ elements:\n  1. The column name\n  2. The table from which the column is or columns\
  \ are drawn\n  3. The variable underpinning the column, which is specific to the\
  \ job."
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
slots:
- column
- variable
- table

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: ColumnDesc
description: "Job manifest: column scope description and annotations\nThis has three\
  \ elements:\n  1. The column name\n  2. The table from which the column is or columns\
  \ are drawn\n  3. The variable underpinning the column, which is specific to the\
  \ job."
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
attributes:
  column:
    name: column
    description: Column name in table
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    multivalued: false
    alias: column
    owner: ColumnDesc
    domain_of:
    - ColumnDesc
    range: string
    required: true
  variable:
    name: variable
    description: Name of variable underpinning column, specific to the job
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    multivalued: false
    alias: variable
    owner: ColumnDesc
    domain_of:
    - ColumnDesc
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  table:
    name: table
    description: Table description from which column is drawn, specifically matching
      the `atomic_name' field of a given instance of a `TableDesc' class.
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    alias: table
    owner: ColumnDesc
    domain_of:
    - ColumnDesc
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true

docs.title: Type: Curie
docs.text:
a compact URI

URI: xsd:string

  • base: Curie

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Comments
docs.text:
• in RDF serializations this MUST be expanded to a URI
  • in non-RDF serializations MAY be serialized as the compact representation

docs.title: Class: JobDesc
docs.text:
Job manifest: job specification attributes which specific job sub-classes inherit

URI: saved:JobDesc

 classDiagram
    class JobDesc
      JobDesc : atomic_name

      JobDesc : job_scope_collected

          JobDesc --> ColumnDesc : job_scope_collected

      JobDesc : job_scope_descriptive

          JobDesc --> ColumnDesc : job_scope_descriptive

      JobDesc : job_scope_modelled

          JobDesc --> ColumnDesc : job_scope_modelled

      JobDesc : job_type

      JobDesc : title

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance atomic_name 1..1  String Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting underscor... direct title 0..1  String Concise human-readable name for the element direct job_type 1..1  Uriorcurie While this is analogous to Dublin Core's notion of type, it is specific to jo... direct job_scope_descriptive 0..*  ColumnDesc A collection of column descriptions which describe something about the world direct job_scope_collected 0..*  ColumnDesc A collection of column descriptions which are collected or sampled direct job_scope_modelled 0..*  ColumnDesc A collection of column descriptions which are modelled or simulated direct

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used ManifestDesc jobs range JobDesc

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self saved:JobDesc native saved:JobDesc

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: JobDesc
description: 'Job manifest: job specification attributes which specific job sub-classes
  inherit'
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
slots:
- atomic_name
- title
- job_type
- job_scope_descriptive
- job_scope_collected
- job_scope_modelled

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: JobDesc
description: 'Job manifest: job specification attributes which specific job sub-classes
  inherit'
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
attributes:
  atomic_name:
    name: atomic_name
    description: 'Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting
      underscores'
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    exact_mappings:
    - dc:identifier
    broad_mappings:
    - saved:name
    - dc:title
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: atomic_name
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    - JobDesc
    - ManifestDesc
    range: string
    required: true
    pattern: ^:?[a-z]+[[a-z]|_|]*$
  title:
    name: title
    description: Concise human-readable name for the element
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: dcterms:title
    alias: title
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    - JobDesc
    range: string
  job_type:
    name: job_type
    description: While this is analogous to Dublin Core's notion of type, it is specific
      to jobs proper, because there is a well-defined range of the jobs we know about.
      Undefined job types cannot be processed.
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    broad_mappings:
    - saved:type
    rank: 1000
    alias: job_type
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - JobDesc
    range: uriorcurie
    required: true
  job_scope_descriptive:
    name: job_scope_descriptive
    description: A collection of column descriptions which describe something about
      the world
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    is_a: job_scope
    multivalued: true
    alias: job_scope_descriptive
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - JobDesc
    range: ColumnDesc
    inlined: true
    inlined_as_list: true
  job_scope_collected:
    name: job_scope_collected
    description: A collection of column descriptions which are collected or sampled
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    is_a: job_scope
    multivalued: true
    alias: job_scope_collected
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - JobDesc
    range: ColumnDesc
    inlined: true
    inlined_as_list: true
  job_scope_modelled:
    name: job_scope_modelled
    description: A collection of column descriptions which are modelled or simulated
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    is_a: job_scope
    multivalued: true
    alias: job_scope_modelled
    owner: JobDesc
    domain_of:
    - JobDesc
    range: ColumnDesc
    inlined: true
    inlined_as_list: true

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

URI: xsd:string

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Type: Jsonpointer
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Pointer. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to a valid object within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

URI: xsd:string

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Class: ManifestDesc
docs.text:
Job manifest: complete specification

URI: saved:ManifestDesc

 classDiagram
    class ManifestDesc
      ManifestDesc : atomic_name

      ManifestDesc : gcp_source

      ManifestDesc : jobs

          ManifestDesc --> JobDesc : jobs

      ManifestDesc : local_version

      ManifestDesc : tables

          ManifestDesc --> TableDesc : tables

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance atomic_name 1..1  String Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting underscor... direct tables 1..*  TableDesc Specification of mappings between resources and schemas, as well as columns o... direct jobs 1..*  JobDesc Specification of operations to run on resources and schemas provided direct gcp_source 0..1  String GCP account of the generator of the manifest direct local_version 0..1  String Version number of local submission utility direct

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self saved:ManifestDesc native saved:ManifestDesc

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: ManifestDesc
description: 'Job manifest: complete specification'
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
slots:
- atomic_name
- tables
- jobs
- gcp_source
- local_version

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: ManifestDesc
description: 'Job manifest: complete specification'
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
attributes:
  atomic_name:
    name: atomic_name
    description: 'Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting
      underscores'
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    exact_mappings:
    - dc:identifier
    broad_mappings:
    - saved:name
    - dc:title
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: atomic_name
    owner: ManifestDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    - JobDesc
    - ManifestDesc
    range: string
    required: true
    pattern: ^:?[a-z]+[[a-z]|_|]*$
  tables:
    name: tables
    description: Specification of mappings between resources and schemas, as well
      as columns or dimensions to bring into into scope
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    multivalued: true
    alias: tables
    owner: ManifestDesc
    domain_of:
    - ManifestDesc
    range: TableDesc
    required: true
    inlined: true
    inlined_as_list: true
  jobs:
    name: jobs
    description: Specification of operations to run on resources and schemas provided
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    multivalued: true
    alias: jobs
    owner: ManifestDesc
    domain_of:
    - ManifestDesc
    range: JobDesc
    required: true
    inlined: true
    inlined_as_list: true
  gcp_source:
    name: gcp_source
    description: GCP account of the generator of the manifest
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    alias: gcp_source
    owner: ManifestDesc
    domain_of:
    - ManifestDesc
    range: string
    required: false
  local_version:
    name: local_version
    description: Version number of local submission utility
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    narrow_mappings:
    - pav:version
    rank: 1000
    alias: local_version
    owner: ManifestDesc
    domain_of:
    - ManifestDesc
    range: string
    required: false

docs.title: Type: Sparqlpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path. The value of the string MUST conform to SPARQL syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded as RDF.

URI: xsd:string

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance atomic_name 1..1  String Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting underscor... direct title 0..1  String Concise human-readable name for the element direct description 0..1  String Human-readable description of the element direct resource_path 1..1  Uriorcurie Path or URI of resource direct schema_path 1..1  Uriorcurie Path or URI of schema associated with resource direct resource_hash 1..1  String Checksum of resource direct

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: TableDesc
description: 'Job manifest: data source descriptive attributes'
from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
attributes:
  atomic_name:
    name: atomic_name
    description: 'Short-form name / atom: lower-case, no special characters excepting
      underscores'
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    exact_mappings:
    - dc:identifier
    broad_mappings:
    - saved:name
    - dc:title
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: atomic_name
    owner: TableDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    - JobDesc
    - ManifestDesc
    range: string
    required: true
    pattern: ^:?[a-z]+[[a-z]|_|]*$
  title:
    name: title
    description: Concise human-readable name for the element
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: dcterms:title
    alias: title
    owner: TableDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    - JobDesc
    range: string
  description:
    name: description
    description: Human-readable description of the element
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: dcterms:description
    alias: description
    owner: TableDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc
    range: string
  resource_path:
    name: resource_path
    description: Path or URI of resource
    from_schema: http://marine.gov.scot/metadata/saved/schema/meta/

    is_a: path

    owner: TableDesc
    domain_of:
    - TableDesc

    description: Path or URI of schema associated with resource

    is_a: path

    rank: 1000
    is_a: hash
    alias: resource_hash
    owner: TableDesc
    domain_of:

    range: string

docs.title: Type: Time
docs.text:
A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular day

URI: xsd:time

  • base: XSDTime

  • uri: xsd:time

  • repr: str

docs.title: Type: Uri
docs.text:
a complete URI

URI: xsd:anyURI

  • base: URI

  • uri: xsd:anyURI

  • repr: str

docs.title: Comments
docs.text: • in RDF serializations a slot with range of uri is treated as a literal or type xsd:anyURI unless it is an identifier or a reference to an identifier, in which case it is translated directly to a node

docs.title: Type: Uriorcurie
docs.text:
a URI or a CURIE

URI: xsd:anyURI

  • base: URIorCURIE

  • uri: xsd:anyURI

  • repr: str
